paragraphs.body: This page is to categorize every article, such as locations, titles, organizations and battles, relating to ${link_0}, with the exception of characters and residents (no need for them), and the article for the city itself.
paragraphs.text: This page is to categorize every article, such as locations, titles, organizations and battles, relating to Ba Sing Se, with the exception of characters and residents (no need for them), and the article for the city itself.
